title: Create a change log download task

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Query start time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS . Example: 2025-09-01 00:00:00 .

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Query end time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS Example: 2025-09-01 00:00:00 . Note : The largest time gap allowed is 30 days, so please specify a date within 30 days after the start_time as end_time.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Timezone of returned value, refer to Appendix-Time Zone for optional values.

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: Module to be queried, optional values: BIDDING_AND_OPTIMIZATION BUDGET STATUS TARGETING

parameters.name: object_type
parameters.description: Query object type, optional values: AD , ADGROUP , ADVERTISER , CAMPAIGN , INSTANT_FORM

parameters.name: operation_types
parameters.description: Operation type, optional values: CREATE , AUDIT , STATUS , UPDATE , DELETE , DOWNLOAD_LEADS , SUBSCRIBE_FORM , UNSUBSCRIBE_FORM
